item.title: Custom items 317
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

Yes thank you, the color of it looks great now, but its still wielded as a weapon, i need to know how to make it wield as a hat, and also i need to know how to make things wield as boots, can someone help me with this???

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items 317
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“dagger9090, post:1, topic:518100”]317 delta

can someone fix this code for me and explain to me what you changed in it, like what was wrong with it.
basically im making a lava party hat, but its bronze, i want that changed to the lava colored code, and make it so it is wielded on your head and not as your weapon, because my client has some custom phats and g body but they are all wielded as weapons so i need to know how to fix.

you get it, so here is code.

if(i == 6898){ //Kyles phat class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; class8.anInt174 = 2635; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Kyle's Party Hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Party Hat for the unreal Owner, Kyle.".getBytes();

Somebody fix this up for me with some explaination i would be ever so greatful :)[/quote]
Change
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652;
To
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6073;

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items 317
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

317 delta

can someone fix this code for me and explain to me what you changed in it, like what was wrong with it.
basically im making a lava party hat, but its bronze, i want that changed to the lava colored code, and make it so it is wielded on your head and not as your weapon, because my client has some custom phats and g body but they are all wielded as weapons so i need to know how to fix.

you get it, so here is code.

if(i == 6898){ //Kyles phat class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; class8.anInt174 = 2635; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Kyle's Party Hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Party Hat for the unreal Owner, Kyle.".getBytes();
